Immune to stun effects.description: This character cannot be stunned or paralyzed.

Critical slash deals double damage.description: Critical hits will deal twice the normal damage.

Heals small HP when attacking.description: Heals for 10% of the damage dealt with each attack.

Chance to dodge and counterattack.description: Has a 20% chance to dodge an attack and immediately counter.

Can transform to boost stats temporarily.description: Temporarily boosts ATK and DEF by 20% for 3 turns.

Reduces damage taken for allies.description: Passively reduces all damage taken by allies by 10%.

Can revive once after defeat.description: Upon being defeated, revives once with 50% HP.

Water techniques deal extra damage.description: Water-based attacks deal an additional 25% damage.

Boosts ATK when HP is low.description: Increases ATK by 50% when HP is below 30%.

High chance to land critical attacks.description: Has a permanent 25% increased chance to land a critical hit.

Restores HP to allies occasionally.description: Has a 15% chance to heal all allies for 10% of their max HP each turn.

Copies enemy abilities once per battle.description: Can copy and use an opponent's ability once per battle.

Can disable an enemy for one turn.description: Has a 30% chance to disable an enemy for one turn.

Deals massive damage with Susanoo.name: Susanoo
Deals massive damage with Susanoo.description: Unleashes a devastating attack with a 5-turn cooldown.

Sand shield blocks incoming attacks.description: Has a 40% chance to completely block an incoming attack.

Can block enemy chakra-based attacks.description: Has a 50% chance to nullify any magic-based attacks.

ATK doubles when transformed.description: Can transform to double Attack power.

Boosts ATK after each received hit.description: ATK increases by 5% each time this character is hit, stacking up to 10 times.

Boosts power when allies are defeated.description: Increases ATK by 25% for each fallen ally.

Regenerates HP slowly.description: Regenerates 5% of max HP at the end of each turn.

Boosts ATK after transforming.description: Can transform to increase Attack power by 50%.

Deals extra damage to weakened enemies.description: Deals 50% more damage to enemies below 25% HP.

Heals HP after defeating an enemy.description: Restores 25% of max HP after defeating an opponent.

Absorbs enemy attacks to heal.description: Has a 20% chance to absorb an attack and heal for 50% of the damage taken.

ATK rises with each incoming attack.description: ATK increases by 8% each time this character is hit, stacking up to 5 times.

Chance to instantly obliterate an enemy.description: Has a 5% chance to instantly defeat any enemy.

Reduces enemy SPD temporarily.description: Reduces the target's Speed by 20% for 3 turns.

Increases ATK after taking damage.description: ATK increases by 10% each time this character takes damage.

Can manipulate enemy perception.description: Has a 25% chance to confuse the enemy, making them attack their allies for 2 turns.

Instant KO chance.description: A small, but terrifying, 10% chance to instantly defeat the opponent.
